alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Custer County through 900 PM CDT... At 829 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Litchfield to 6 miles southwest of Oconto. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burr Oak, Block Hill Basin, Gavin Siding, Intersection of Highway 183 and Cumro Road and Cumro. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 73 and 82. Highway 2 between mile markers 305 and 307. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Nebraska.
